chatGptLabel: Create description of anything using it's URL.
promptPrefix:
Your task is to read content under [PROMPT]. Then create a description of what that content is.

Description shall be separated into three paragraphs; first one being giving general idea of what is it that is under [PROMPT], the second paragraph shall highlight usability of the [PROMPT] and third one shall describe who [PROMPT] is aimed at.

Every paragraph shall begin in different manner.

Description shall be between 400-800 symbols.

All the output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Create description of anything using it's URL.
